content.text:
[@Connor](@8BGQMzr+5NHOIAvWg5BUOxbgciHppT3Sv1jOFVUE3Bw=.ed25519) 

That looks rad, looking forward to application photos! The first time I waxed my chukkas I used *way* too much wax, and it took me weeks until they looked right again. These days I've been less interested in leather and more into the idea of waxing cotton/hemp, or maybe even something like lyocell. I wish waxed [pants](%EyS4J6vN5REsvyi5aW1/XvPre+oAHu4lgi8YGxekw/8=.sha256) were a thing, but I just imagine this:


![waxed denim pants](&hFhGxIvhxXKv3Bk+tGXlV6Arjz8AZX6V33TeL577w1U=.sha256)
